translations.source: 干法熄焦用惰性气体冷却焦炭。
translations.target: In dry quenching, coke is cooled using an inert gas.

translations.source: 筛焦楼将焦炭按粒度分级。
translations.target: The coke screening building grades coke by particle size.

translations.source: 配煤工艺决定了焦炭的质量。
translations.target: The coal blending process determines coke quality.

translations.source: 热回收焦炉利用废热发电。
translations.target: Heat-recovery coke ovens use waste heat to generate electricity.

translations.source: 焦炉煤气是重要的副产品。
translations.target: Coke oven gas is an important by-product.
